Portfolio

About

I develop and prettify things. I currently make the world a better place with some HTML, CSS, and JavaScript magic… I happily play around with other languages as well.

I have a background in Engineering from The University of Texas, and am currently in sunny Los Angeles. I highly enjoy improv comedy, being active, fair weather, and dried mango chili habañero.

Let's Get In Touch!

Ready to start your next project with me? Great! Send me an email or Give me a call and I'll get back to you in a flash!

Adam's Auto

Description:

Adam's Auto is a single-page, responsive website that showcases pertinent information of a small business. The site utilizes front-end technologies and is responsive.

Technologies Used:

  • HTML
  • CSS/SCSS
  • JavaScript
  • Twitter Bootstrap
  • Gulp

Features:

  • Single-page
  • Responsive

  • Live Preview
  • View Source on GitHub

JavaScript Carousel OOP

Description:

A JavaScript OOP project that allows multiple instances of a Carousel object. It utilizes an MVC framework and supports AJAX calls to Flickr API.

Technologies Used:

  • JavaScript
  • AJAX
  • Flickr API

Features:

  • Object-oriented Programming (OOP)
  • MVC Framework

  • Live Preview
  • View Source on GitHub

Fifty States

Description:

A web app that shows information for any US state using plain JavaScript without jQuery. When a user provides an input, the JavaScript code will make an AJAX request to the server. The app also features an interactive SVG map.

Technologies Used:

  • JavaScript
  • HTML/HAML
  • CSS/SCSS
  • PHP
  • SVG
  • AJAX

Features:

  • No jQuery
  • Interactive SVG map
  • Single-page

  • Live Preview
  • View Source on GitHub

ImprovMasters

Description:

An organization website that utilizes Google Docs as a back-end. The information from the Google Document is fetched via jQuery and then delivered as JSON.

Technologies Used:

  • HTML/HAML
  • CSS/SCSS
  • JavaScript
  • jQuery
  • Twitter Bootstrap
  • Middleman
  • Google Docs & JSON

Features:

  • Responsive Design
  • Utilizes Google Docs as a back-end

C++ Programming


A computer graphics project using C++ and OpenGL. Laws of Physics were followed in developing the code like using spring constant and acceleration/deceleration.

Lighting & Animation


Worked on lighting and animation on Star Wars assets during my time at Lucasfilm.
